children.subject: Does when we apply affect our decision? Like is there an advantage to applying now versus on the 15th? I'm trying not to submit at the last minute, but there a few things I could use a bit more time on right now.

Interfolio is what you're referring to, and that's fine. It should be fully integrated with the online application system, so I'm not aware of any email (other than what is provided by the recommender link).
I am using berkeley's carrer center letter service for rec letters from my professors. They have an option of sending the rec letter via email. What email do I use to send in the rec letters ?

history.content:
Hello everyone,

We are aiming for a quick turnaround to get decisions out to applicants so they have ample time to SIR by the April 15th deadline. Therefore, we require all materials submitted BY THE DEADLINE. This program already has the latest application deadline of any grad program on campus, so we are sticking to it and will strictly enforce this. This includes your recommendation letters. Hopefully, you aren't reaching out to people last minute so they can have ample time to prepare and say something good about you.
Best,
Michael
history.subject: EECS 5th Yr MS Deadline to apply -- 8:59 PST March 15th.
